name: Neon City Ninja
description:
NEON CITY NINJA

Best played with controller!

How to play:

To move the player use the left joystick, or the arrow(or W/D) keys. Jump from roof to roof, but don't fall! To defend against enemies you can throw your knives using the right bumper or the space bar. You although have the ability to dash forward and defeat them by striking with your Katana. To do this use the  left bumper or TAB key but keep in mind that your uses are limited. If you want to upgrade your stats or buy items, just press X button on the controller or the E key on the keyboard.

You can pick up and buy items. To use your item use the A button on the controller and the Q key on the keyboard. 

Items:

  • Sushi: Use the dash as often as you want for 10 sec.
  • Jetpack: Fly for a short time using A Button on controller or the Q Key. But remember to watch your fuel!

Have Fun!
